abstract: A technology industry foundation aims to reduce password overload among computer users through the creation of a system akin to an online identity card.
snippet: A technology industry foundation aims to reduce password overload among computer users through the creation of a system akin to an online identity card.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Microsoft, Google and PayPal, a unit of eBay, are among the founders of an industry organization that hopes to solve the problem of password overload among computer users.

headline.main: Technology Leaders Favor Online ID Card Over Passwords
headline.print_headline: Technology Leaders Favor Online ID Card Over Passwords

abstract: Six years after its start, Google News is far from achieving the kind of dominant position in news that the company has in other areas.
snippet: Six years after its start, Google News is far from achieving the kind of dominant position in news that the company has in other areas.
lead_paragraph: MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.  The death of Tim Russert of NBC News this month quickly became a top article on the nation’s biggest news sites.

headline.main: At Google, Slow Growth in News Site
headline.print_headline: At Google, Slow Growth In News Site

abstract: In a Florida trial, Google data will be used to argue that explicit material doesn’t violate community values.
snippet: In a Florida trial, Google data will be used to argue that explicit material doesn’t violate community values.
lead_paragraph: Judges and jurors who must decide whether sexually explicit material is obscene are asked to use a local yardstick: does the material violate community standards?

headline.main: What’s Obscene? Google Could Have an Answer
headline.print_headline: What’s Obscene? Defendant Says Google Data Offers a Gauge
